attributes.action: Stop wasting any more public money on investigations into the death of Diana
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop wasting any more public money on investigations into the death of Diana - she can not be brought back.
Would Diana have wished public funds be expended on futile attempts to explain the circumstances of her death, when monies saved could be directed to better uses (possibly some of them dear to her own heart).  Do the majority of UK citizens really have any interest in yet another "conspiracy theory" ?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop wasting any more public money on investigations into the death of Diana."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14606.asp

Prime Minister's Office
